_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

ImportCustomsDeclaration.description: A customs declaration document for importing goods.

ImportCustomsDeclaration.title: Import Customs Declaration. Details
ImportCustomsDeclaration.description: A customs declaration document for importing goods.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Import Customs Declaration. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Import Customs Declaration. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Import Customs Declaration. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Import Customs Declaration. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

UUID.title: Import Customs Declaration. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Import Customs Declaration. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Import Customs Declaration. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

TypeCode.title: Import Customs Declaration. Type Code. Code
TypeCode.description: Code specifying the type of import.

SubTypeCode.title: Import Customs Declaration. Sub_ Type Code. Code
SubTypeCode.description: Code specifying the subtype of import.

NatureOfTransactionCode.title: Import Customs Declaration. Nature Of_ Transaction Code. Code
NatureOfTransactionCode.description: Code specifying the type of transactions for this import

Note.title: Import Customs Declaration. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

VersionID.title: Import Customs Declaration. Version. Identifier
VersionID.description: Identifies a version of an Import Customs Declaration in order to distinguish updates.

ValidityPeriod.title: Import Customs Declaration. Validity_ Period. Period
ValidityPeriod.description: A period, assigned by the issuer, during which the information in the declaration is valid.

CustomsExitOfficeLocation.title: Import Customs Declaration. Customs Exit Office_ Location. Location
CustomsExitOfficeLocation.description: Customs exit office of the goods being declared.

JurisdictionRegionAddress.title: Import Customs Declaration. Jurisdiction Region_ Address. Address
JurisdictionRegionAddress.description: A geographic area in which this declaration applies.

ImporterParty.title: Import Customs Declaration. Importer_ Party. Party
ImporterParty.description: The Party who makes the import declaration, or on whose behalf the import declaration is made, and who is the owner of the goods or has similar right of disposal over them at the time when the declaration is accepted.

ConsignorParty.title: Import Customs Declaration. Consignor_ Party. Party
ConsignorParty.description: The Party responsible for the consignment

ConsigneeParty.title: Import Customs Declaration. Consignee_ Party. Party
ConsigneeParty.description: The Party responsible for receiving the goods.

FreightForwarderParty.title: Import Customs Declaration. Freight Forwarder_ Party. Party
FreightForwarderParty.description: The Party responsibe for the freight forwarding.

CustomsParty.title: Import Customs Declaration. Customs_ Party. Party
CustomsParty.description: The authority who is legally responsible for processing the declaration.

NotifierParty.title: Import Customs Declaration. Notifier_ Party. Party
NotifierParty.description: The party responsible for contact on master level.

Shipment.title: Import Customs Declaration. Shipment
Shipment.description: The shipment related to this trade certificate

PreviousCustomsDeclaration.title: Import Customs Declaration. Previous_ Customs Declaration. Customs Declaration
PreviousCustomsDeclaration.description: A reference to a previously sent customs declaration.

AdditionalDocumentReference.title: Import Customs Declaration. Additional_ Document Reference. Document Reference
AdditionalDocumentReference.description: A reference to additional documents related to or relevant for this customs declaration.

Signature.title: Import Customs Declaration. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.
